data.title: SeePavillion am Tegeler See
data.meta_description: Rent "SeePavillion am Tegeler See" for your event! Get directly in touch and request a non-binding offer now Â»
data.text:
The SeePavillon is located just a few steps away from Lake Tegel.

Where the legendary Pavillon du Lac used to host parties, our event location was created in 2007. Our modern rooms and spacious terraces invite you to celebrate your wedding, family or company party here.

Experience your very special day in the unique ambience of enchanting nature directly on the shores of Lake Tegel. Visit us and see our beautiful location for yourself.

We have an extensive range of decoration equipment and contacts.

From our in-house florist, DJ, artist agency and photographer. We can also plan and work out special requests together.
